messages.subject: Re: Fwd: [unschoolingbasics] Introduction
messages.msgSnippet: ... like attending this workshop and unschooling has come to us at the same time, at exactly the right moment. Don t you love when the universe just aligns
messages.messageBody:
>>It's almost
like attending this workshop and unschooling has come to us at the same time,
at exactly the right moment.>>

Don't you love when the universe just aligns like that? I think you must have been putting out something that drew these things to you.

--
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

From: barndogzzz@...

messages.subject: Fwd: [unschoolingbasics] Introduction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/1/2006 5:59:10 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... ****Ya know Ren, unschooling is healing to old wounds. My dh and I are attending a workshop
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/1/2006 5:59:10 PM Eastern Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:


> but I hope you'll also
> find healing for those old wounds. A lot of us have found unschooling
> to be very healing for the inner child.:) welcome.
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com

****Ya know Ren, unschooling is healing to old wounds. My dh and I are
attending a workshop right now called "Inner Healing." It has gotten pretty deep
here and there, even things you thought were gone from your life and/or pushed
aside seem to surface. I have been noticing a lot of what is being said there
has also been said in one way or another within the world of unschoooling (on
these sort of groups) and everything just clicks and feels right. It's almost
like attending this workshop and unschooling has come to us at the same time,
at exactly the right moment.

Nancy





>
>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
